dict.acceptation: 华丽的，艳丽的；极好的，称心的；美丽动人的，光彩夺目的；令人愉快的，令人享受的；

sent.orig: At the ball the lady in red appeared very charming, and gorgeous.
sent.trans: 舞会上，那位红妆女郎娇艳欲滴。

sent.orig: Who am i to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented and fabulous?
sent.trans: 我是聪明的，是华丽的，是才华横溢的还是出类拔萃的呢？

sent.orig: Your wife is really gorgeous. I can't take my eyes off her.
sent.trans: 你的老婆太迷人了。真是让人目不转睛。

sent.orig: Then the scene behind the spectre faded away andsucceeded by the representation of a gorgeous palace.
sent.trans: 这时，幽灵身后的景色消失了，随后出现了一座豪华的宫殿。

sent.orig: Until one day reading a station last chance, suddenly bright and gorgeous colors burning his eyes.
sent.trans: 直到某日偶然翻阅一本台历时，突然被一片鲜艳而斑斓的色彩灼痛了双眼。
